oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cast of "Richard III"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama clubs; Performances; Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The Maurelian Literary Society of Christian Brothers College performed Shakespeare's Richard III at the Lyceum Theatre in Memphis, Tennessee.
Identified cast members were Lee Bernstein, Dan Bianchi, James Bowling, Philip M. Canale, Edward Colbert, Edward Dillon, Everett Ellison, Edwin Fraser, Francis Glanker, Bernard Holthouse, Philip Isaacs, Raymond Kearney, Patrick Lyons, Arthur Maxon, Harry R. McCleary, Austin McDermott, Joseph Newsom, J. Everett Pidgeon, Humbert Pierini, Stephen Schillin, Edwin Slattery, Willian Stanton, Hamilton Taylor.
